message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll be satisfied with the value it brings. Would you like to purchase it?
I'll take it!
I've got another high-quality product for you! This one is a bit different from the first one, but it's still a great value at $100. Would you like to buy it?
I'm not sure if it's the same quality as the first one. I'll pass for now.

I understand your concerns, but I assure you that this one is indeed of the same high quality as the first one. In fact, I'll give you a special offer: I'll include a 10-year warranty on this product, which is not typically offered. Would you like to take advantage of this deal?
The warranty is a great added value! I'll take the product.

I'll take it! The guarantee and the best-seller label make it hard to resist.

I'll take it! The limited production run and unique craftsmanship make it hard to pass up.
